file_content.text: Good to know House Organa can count on allies like you.
Clear out those explosives around the weather tower before you disarm the main charge at the base.
What are you doing out here, Captain?
Keeping an eye on some agents from House Thul. See that weather tower way off in the distance?
They're planting explosives in the surrounding area. Trying to replicate a groundquake to weaken the foundation.
Then they'll set off charges at the tower's base and bring it crashing down on top of the town below it.
What did that town ever do to them?
Why destroy the town?
Nothing. House Thul just wants to cause chaos and confusion. They figure the worse things get, the better their chances of taking over.
So how do we stop them?
So how do we stop them?
Killing civilians. Disgusting.
What else do you expect from House Thul? They're allied with the Empire.
I can't spare any troops right now, but someone needs to go up there and disarm those explosives.
I could help... for a price.
I can probably scrounge up a few credits.
Clear out the explosives in the surrounding area first. Then disarm the main charge at the base of the tower.
Watch out for snipers and Thul patrols. If you manage this, send word to Captain Barra--she's evacuating the civilians.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
Then maybe you should go bother someone else.
I don't have time to chat. I'm on duty.
What are you doing here? Get inside that outpost and destroy House Thul's intel!
Speak with Captain Barra. She knows the situation with that weather tower.
Keeping an eye on some agents from House Thul. See this weather tower, way off in the distance?
Those agents took some heavy equipment in that direction. We're not sure what they're up to.
Something bad.
Our troops are stretched thin in that area, and Thul knows it. Perfect time for sabotage.
Let's find out.
So why worry?
I've got plenty to worry about. Thul's allied with the Empire. They'll do anything to win.
We haven't lost this war yet, but we don't need any surprises. Whatever's going on at that tower, we need to stop it.
If you're heading that way, we could use some support. Our troops can't handle the Empire and House Thul alone.
I can lend a hand.
What kind of support?
Communication from the area's been spotty. Could be whatever Thul's doing to the tower.
Coordinates to the nearest outpost. Captain Barra's in command of what we have left.
Check in with Captain Barra when you arrive. She'll have more intel on that tower.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
My creds are on that town below it. Thul blows up that tower, the debris destroys the town.
Whatever Thul is up to, we're not taking any chances. We're evacuating the town. We could use help at the tower.
